author: pburba
msg: Facilitate wc-ng migration work by removing an unnecessary request for
to handle the case where an uncommitted merge has removed a path's
mergeinfo, we can accomplish the same thing with svn_wc_get_prop_diffs2().

author: rhuijben
msg: Resolve regression introduced in r26667, that makes modification checks
succeed as file-unmodified, even though the file is locked by another
process. This regression is probably only noticable on Windows.
(In my case as a 12 second delay in 'svn status' without a final error).
(svn_wc__text_modified_internal_p): Don't forget that we had an error

author: sussman
msg: Make r38686 api-promise compatible with 1.6.5 and and 1.5.x backport.
